title: Device Control for macOS policy file

groups.title: The machine groups to be used within rules

rules.title: The rules which define the behavior of device control for a group of devices

id.title: UUID to uniquely identify this rule.

includeGroups.title: List of all the groups that a device must be a member of (logical AND) for this rule to be applicable.

excludeGroups.title: List of groups which override the applicability logic of includeGroups.  Membership in any of these groups (logical OR) will disable the rule for a device.

entries.title: The enforcement behavior for this rule.  Entries are traversed in order, and the first match dictates the action taken.

unallowedApplications.title: Additional applications to restrict when a restricted apple device is attached to the system.

excludedPaths.title: Paths to allow restricted applications to access.

unallowedApplications.title: Additional applications to restrict when a restricted bluetooth device is attached to the system.

excludedPaths.title: Paths to allow restricted applications to access.

unallowedApplications.title: Additional applications to restrict when a restricted portable device is attached to the system.

excludedPaths.title: Paths to allow restricted applications to access.

defaultEnforcement.title: Default Enforcement if no rules match an action.

protectedLocations.title: Additional paths that should be protected from restricted applications.

items.title: Path to protect from restricted applications.

navigationTarget.title: URI to direct users to if the UX notification is clicked.

primaryId.title: Primary ID Clause
primaryId.description: Match a device to an overall device family

vendorId.title: Vendor ID Clause
vendorId.description: Match a device with a specific vendor ID

productId.title: Product ID Clause
productId.description: Match a device with a specific product ID

serialNumber.title: Serial Number Clause
serialNumber.description: Match a device with a specific serial number

groupId.title: Group ID Clause
groupId.description: Match if a device is a member of a different group.  Note: ID must belong to a group that was defined prior to this clause.

encryption.title: Encryption Clause
encryption.description: Match if a device is encrypted. (Only supports Removable Media Devices)

fileType.title: File Type
fileType.description: Match against a file type. (Only supports Removable Media Devices)

binaryQuery.title: A query which describes the devices to include in this group

$type.title: Describes how this query combines clauses

items.title: An individual clause to match against a device

unaryQuery.title: A query which describes the devices to include in this group

$type.title: Negates the result of the contained query

binaryQuery.title: A query which describes the files to include in this group

$type.title: Describes how this query combines clauses

items.title: An individual clause to match against a device

unaryQuery.title: A query which describes the file types to include in this group

$type.title: Describes how this query combines clauses

deviceGroup.title: Identifies a specific group of devices

id.title: UUID representing a unique ID for this group.

name.title: A friendly name for the group

fileGroup.title: Identifies a specific group of file types

id.title: UUID representing a unique ID for this group.

name.title: A friendly name for the group

options.title: Options to control the behavior of block events

tag.title: Custom tag to propogate to portal

options.title: Options to control the behavior of allow events

tag.title: Custom tag to propogate to portal

options.title: Options to control the logging of block events
Options to control the logging of allow events

appleDeviceEntry.title: An entry to control actions for apple devices

any.title: A paramter query which requires only one of its members to be included

values.title: The file groups to be used within the entry

all.title: A paramter query which requires all of its members to be included

values.title: The file groups to be used within the entry

removableMediaEntry.title: An entry for a removable media device

bluetoothDeviceEntry.title: An entry for a bluetooth device

portableDeviceEntry.title: An entry for a portable device

genericEntry.title: An entry to generically control actions

access.title: The access kind to control.  Will be translated into device specific access kinds.

applicationIdentifier.title: Identify an application
applicationIdentifier.description: Identifying information for an application.  Only one property is required, if multiple are provided will match any process that satisfies any provided identifiers.
